description:
Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is the next-generation multi-format document-processing component suite for .NET developers. Currently, it supports viewing, printing, and converting PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, TIFF and MTIFF. More formats will be introduced in future. XtremeDocumentStudio includes multi-format document viewer controls for WinForms, WebForms, MVC, WPF, and HTML5. It can also convert document from one format to another, such as DOCX-to-PDF or PDF to images without requiring any other external software or libraries. It can also intelligently reconstruct page elements when converting PDF to DOCX. Some features such as programmatic document-creation, document-editing, and mail-merge have been introduced as a preview or beta.

XtremeDocumentStudio .NET is 100% managed code. It can natively process supported formats without requiring external software such as Microsoft Word, Open XML SDK, Word Automation Services, Adobe PDF library or GhostScript.
releaseNotes:
Version 2015 R11 - June 12, 2015
=================================
Enhanced
~~~~~~~~
- Multi-Format Document Converter
  + [new] Introduced OCR capability[**]
    * [new] Introduced converting scanned documents to searchable PDF
      - Supported input formats: DOCX, PDF, DOC, BMP, PNG, TIFF, JPG
    * [new] Introduced "DigitizerSettings" class to specify settings for converting input documents.
      - "DigitizationMode" property to decide whether to digitize content from input documents.
      - "RecognizeElementTypes" property to specify page elements in the input document that need to be digitized (currently only text elements are supported).
      - "OCRSettings" property to specify input language (currently only English is supported).
      - "ImageEnhancementSettings" property to configure enhancement techniques and modes to pre-process images before digitization.
        + Enhancement modes
          * USE_SPECIFIED_TECHNIQUES - Applies a specified list of image-processing techniques before digitization.
          * AUTO - Automatically determines the combination of image-processing technique(s) that would produce the highest accuracy.
          * OFF - Does not use any image-processing technique before digitization.
        + Enhancement techniques
          * Scaling - Scales the image dimensions to specified magnification factor.
          * Skew Correction - Detects the skew angle of the image and uses the skew-corrected image for digitization.        
          * Graying - Grayscales the image.    

- Mail Merge
  + [new] Introduced new event called “NeedFieldMapping” to handle unmapped/previously not mapped fields

Improvements:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
- Multi-Format Document Viewer / Printer / Converter (WinForms and WPF)
  + [new] Introduced “Preferences” class which groups various settings such as 
    * Rendering Settings
      - Image Settings with options such as InterpolationMode, CompositingQuality, CompositingMode, PixelOffsetMode  
      - Shape smoothing options
      - Text rendering options
    * Password dialog settings which includes inbuilt password dialog and options such as attempts count. This is available with DocumentViewer [WinForms and WPF] and DocumentPrinter
    * DigitizationSettings in DocumentConverter component
  + Renamed EncoderParams as EncoderSettings
  + Renamed ConverterParams as ConverterSettings


Fixed:
~~~~~~~~
- Rendering
  + PDF
    * DCT 8BPC RGB Images with Grayscale(with decode array) Masking is fixed.


**Digitization/OCR feature uses unmanaged assemblies. These unmanaged assemblies need  to be referred in the project only if OCR capability is needed.
summary: View, print and convert PDF, DOCX, DOC, BMP, JPEG, PNG, WMF, EMF, and single-page and multi-page TIFF. Provides ASP .NET viewer, WinForms viewer, MVC viewer and WPF viewer components.
title: Gnostice XtremeDocumentStudio .NET Ultimate
